entries.content: Successfully fixed critical welcome page performance issue. Root cause: GradientRotationController running 60 FPS requestAnimationFrame loop with 144 DOM mutations per frame even when hidden with display:none. Solution: Remove element from DOM tree completely using removeChild() when hidden. User confirmed ~80% streaming performance improvement. Key lesson: Hidden DOM elements (display:none) still consume significant resources if JS is manipulating them - must remove from DOM tree for inactive components.
